title: [Android] SKBitmap.Decode crash
body:
### Description

The Decode() line simply crashes. And only on Android. The app terminates and there will be nothing in Visual Studio debug. No try-catch catches it, either. But we have a LogCat, see below.

### Code

    var source = (FileImageSource)ImageSource.FromFile((Device.RuntimePlatform == Device.UWP) ? "Resources/trans_square.png" : "trans_square.png");
    var bitmap = SKBitmap.Decode(source.File);

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.60.3

### Error

at <unknown> <0xffffffff>  at (wrapper managed-to-native) SkiaSharp.SkiaApi.sk_codec_new_from_stream (intptr) <0x00037>  at SkiaSharp.SKCodec.Create (SkiaSharp.SKStream) [0x00014] in <0665b4d05b9e46c8a33bb731d6f5db83>:0  at SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode (SkiaSharp.SKStream) [0x0000f] in <0665b4d05b9e46c8a33bb731d6f5db83>:0  at SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode (string) [0x00016] in <0665b4d05b9e46c8a33bb731d6f5db83>:0
